levels.title: three-four time
levels.rhythm: n4 n4 n4 |& n2 n4 | n8 n8b n4 n4 |& n2 n4

levels.title: rest
levels.rhythm: n4 n4 p4+ n8 |& n2 n4 n4 | n4 n4 n8 n8b p4 |& n2 n4 n4

levels.title: two-four time
levels.rhythm: p4+ n8 |& n4 n4 | n8 n8b n4 |& n8 n8b n8 n8b

levels.title: dotted
levels.rhythm: n4+ n8 n4+ n8 |& n8 n8b n4+ n8 n4 | n8 n8b n4+ n8 |& n8 n8b n8b n8b n2

levels.title: triplets
levels.rhythm: n4+ n8 n4+ n8 |& n8+ n16b n8 n8b n2 | n2+ n4 |& n8 n8b n12 n12b n12b n4 n4
